video.title: Ripper Street
video.synopsis: It's been six months since the last Jack the Ripper killing, and East London is hopeful that his reign of terror might have run its course.

episodes.synopsis: A young woman is found brutally murdered, the hallmark signs of the Ripper upon her. But Reid suspects a different evil at work.
episodes.title: I Need Light

episodes.synopsis: A beloved toy maker is beaten to death for a mysterious brass box and the coins in his pocket.
episodes.title: In My Protection

episodes.synopsis: H Division and the Independent City of London force are thrown together in the wake of a sudden cholera outbreak.
episodes.title: The King Came Calling

episodes.synopsis: The brutal clearing of a local slum for the underground railway reveals an indecipherable murder scene and an unreliable slum girl witness.
episodes.title: The Good of This City

episodes.synopsis: A string of brilliantly masterminded robberies draws the attention of Reid and his team.
episodes.title: The Weight of One Man's Heart

episodes.synopsis: The killing of a Jewish anarchist leads Reid and the team into the British government's fight against distant empires and global terrorism.
episodes.title: Tournament of Shadows

episodes.synopsis: An international shipping magnate arrives in town with his Pinkerton retinue to complete the acquisition of an ailing London shipping line.
episodes.title: A Man of My Company

episodes.synopsis: Reid is adrift. A kidnapping offers him cause to assemble his men and tackle the white slavery ring operating in their midst.
episodes.title: What Use Our Work

episodes.synopsis: East London has found no peace; H Division's beat is more chaotic and lawless than ever.
episodes.title: Pure as the Driven

episodes.synopsis: Joseph Merrick, aka the Elephant Man, helps the team to identify an unusual murder victim.
episodes.title: Am I Not Monstrous?

episodes.synopsis: Long Susan finds herself sympathizing with a group of kidnappers with radical aims.
episodes.title: Become Man

episodes.synopsis: Reid sends Detective Constable Flight undercover into Whitechapel's Irish community.
episodes.title: Dynamite and the Woman

episodes.synopsis: Investigations into the slaying of a telegraph boy lift the lid on a secret vice racket.
episodes.title: Threads of Silk and Gold

episodes.synopsis: The domestic happiness that Drake has enjoyed is disrupted by a friend from Bella's past.
episodes.title: A Stronger Loving World

episodes.synopsis: Jackson's reckless elder brother arrives in Whitechapel carrying a valuable uncut diamond.
episodes.title: Our Betrayal: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Reid and Drake are powerless to resist a final reckoning with K Division's Jedediah Shine.
episodes.title: Our Betrayal: Part 2
